columns.anonymization_strategy: Remove, tokenize, or hash with salt; avoid reversibility. Prefer drop for ML tasks unless strictly needed. Clip/winsorize outliers; consider z-score cap; optional Gaussian/Laplace DP noise.
Review for leakage; consider clipping, winsorizing, and rare-level aggregation. Normalize categories; group rare labels; avoid high-cardinality identifiers.

Generalize/bucket to meet k-anonymity (e.g., age bands), coarsen location (e.g., first-3 of postal code), and/or add DP noise to aggregates. Normalize categories; group rare labels; avoid high-cardinality identifiers.

Generalize/bucket to meet k-anonymity (e.g., age bands), coarsen location (e.g., first-3 of postal code), and/or add DP noise to aggregates. Normalize categories; group rare labels; avoid high-cardinality identifiers.
